## StreamEventHandlers.onError() method

Called when the stream encounters an error.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onError?(error: RTSKError): void;
```

## Remarks

Errors are reported as [RTSKError](./rtsk.rtskerror.md) instances and typically transition the controller status to `"error"`<!-- -->.
